creator: victor@pskov.e-nginet.com
text:
Throws the NullPointerException when fop tried parse this intricate table:
<fo:table border-collapse="collapse" start-indent="5.4pt">
<fo:table-column column-number="1" column-width="27pt"/>
<fo:table-column column-number="2" column-width="108pt"/>
<fo:table-column column-number="3" column-width="135pt"/>
<fo:table-column column-number="4" column-width="153pt"/>
<fo:table-column column-number="5" column-width="36pt"/>
<fo:table-column column-number="6" column-width="54pt"/>
<fo:table-body end-indent="0pt" start-indent="0pt">
    <fo:table-row border-collapse="collapse">
        <fo:table-cell border-collapse="collapse" padding-top="0pt"
padding-left="5.4pt" padding-bottom="0pt" padding-right="5.4pt"
border-top-style="solid" border-bottom-style="none" border-top-color="black"
border-bottom-color="black" border-top-width="0.25pt"
border-bottom-width="0.25pt" border-left-style="solid" border-right-style="none"
border-left-color="black" border-right-color="black" border-left-width="0.5pt"
border-right-width="0.25pt" number-columns-spanned="2" number-rows-spanned="2">
            <fo:block font-family="Arial" font-size="10pt" language="DE"
space-before="4pt" space-before.conditionality="retain" font-weight="bold">
                <fo:inline font-family="Arial" font-weight="bold" font-size="10pt">
                    <fo:leader leader-length="0pt"/>Kinder
                </fo:inline>
                <fo:inline font-family="Arial" font-weight="bold" font-size="8pt">
                    <fo:leader leader-length="0pt"/>
                </fo:inline>
                <fo:inline font-family="Arial" font-weight="bold" font-size="10pt">
                    <fo:leader leader-length="0pt"/>- und
                </fo:inline>
                <fo:inline font-family="Arial" font-weight="bold" font-size="10pt">
                    <fo:leader leader-length="0pt"/>Jugendarbeit
                </fo:inline>
            </fo:block> 
        </fo:table-cell>
        <fo:table-cell border-collapse="collapse" padding-top="0pt"
padding-left="5.4pt" padding-bottom="0pt" padding-right="5.4pt"
border-top-style="solid" border-bottom-style="none" border-top-color="black"
border-bottom-color="black" border-top-width="0.25pt"
border-bottom-width="0.25pt" border-left-style="none" border-right-style="none"
border-left-color="black" border-right-color="black" border-left-width="0.25pt"
border-right-width="0.25pt" number-rows-spanned="2">
            <fo:block font-family="Arial" font-size="8pt" language="EN-US"
space-before="4pt" space-before.conditionality="retain" font-weight="bold">
                <fo:inline font-family="Arial" font-weight="bold" font-size="8pt">
                    <fo:leader leader-length="0pt"/>Kindergruppen
                </fo:inline>
                <fo:inline font-family="Arial" font-weight="bold" font-size="8pt">
                    <fo:leader leader-length="0pt"/> in
                </fo:inline>
                <fo:inline font-family="Arial" font-weight="bold" font-size="8pt">
                    <fo:leader leader-length="0pt"/>der
                </fo:inline>
            </fo:block>
            <fo:block font-family="Arial" font-size="8pt" language="EN-US"
font-weight="bold">
                <fo:inline font-family="Arial" font-weight="bold" font-size="8pt">
                    <fo:leader leader-length="0pt"/>Gemeinde
                </fo:inline>
            </fo:block> 
        </fo:table-cell>
        <fo:table-cell border-collapse="collapse" padding-top="0pt"
padding-left="5.4pt" padding-bottom="0pt" padding-right="5.4pt"
border-top-style="solid" border-bottom-style="solid" border-top-color="black"
border-bottom-color="black" border-top-width="0.25pt"
border-bottom-width="0.25pt" border-left-style="none" border-right-style="solid"
border-left-color="black" border-right-color="black" border-left-width="0.25pt"
border-right-width="0.25pt" display-align="center">
            <fo:block font-family="Arial" font-size="8pt" language="DE"
line-height="9pt" space-before="2pt" space-before.conditionality="retain"
text-align="right">
                <fo:inline>
                    <fo:leader leader-length="0pt"/>Anzahl der Kreise
                </fo:inline>
            </fo:block> 
        </fo:table-cell>
        <fo:table-cell border-collapse="collapse" padding-top="0pt"
padding-left="5.4pt" padding-bottom="0pt" padding-right="5.4pt"
border-top-style="solid" border-bottom-style="solid" border-top-color="black"
border-bottom-color="black" border-top-width="0.25pt"
border-bottom-width="0.25pt" border-left-style="solid"
border-right-style="solid" border-left-color="black" border-right-color="black"
border-left-width="0.25pt" border-right-width="0.25pt" display-align="center">
            <fo:block font-family="Arial" font-size="7pt" language="DE"
line-height="9pt" space-before="2pt" space-before.conditionality="retain"
text-align="center">
                <fo:inline font-size="7pt">
                    <fo:leader leader-length="0pt"/>321
                </fo:inline>
            </fo:block> 
        </fo:table-cell>
        <fo:table-cell border-collapse="collapse" padding-top="0pt"
padding-left="5.4pt" padding-bottom="0pt" padding-right="5.4pt"
border-top-style="solid" border-bottom-style="solid" border-top-color="black"
border-bottom-color="black" border-top-width="0.25pt"
border-bottom-width="0.25pt" border-left-style="solid"
border-right-style="solid" border-left-color="black" border-right-color="black"
border-left-width="0.25pt" border-right-width="0.5pt" display-align="center">
            <fo:block font-family="Arial" font-size="8pt" language="DE"
text-align="center" font-weight="bold">
                <fo:inline font-family="Arial" font-weight="bold"
font-size="8pt" language="DE">
                    <xsl:value-of
select="elements/element[@name='field321']/value"/> 
                </fo:inline>
            </fo:block> 
        </fo:table-cell>
    </fo:table-row>
    <fo:table-row border-collapse="collapse">
        <fo:table-cell border-collapse="collapse" padding-top="0pt"
padding-left="5.4pt" padding-bottom="0pt" padding-right="5.4pt"
border-top-style="solid" border-bottom-style="solid" border-top-color="black"
border-bottom-color="black" border-top-width="0.25pt"
border-bottom-width="0.25pt" border-left-style="none" border-right-style="solid"
border-left-color="black" border-right-color="black" border-left-width="0.25pt"
border-right-width="0.25pt">
            <fo:block font-family="Arial" font-size="8pt" language="DE"
line-height="9pt" space-before="2pt" space-before.conditionality="retain"
text-align="right">
                <fo:inline>
                    <fo:leader leader-length="0pt"/>Zahl der Teilnehmer/
                </fo:inline>
                <fo:inline>­
                    <fo:leader leader-length="0pt"/>innen je Zusammenkunft
                </fo:inline>
            </fo:block> 
        </fo:table-cell>
        <fo:table-cell border-collapse="collapse" padding-top="0pt"
padding-left="5.4pt" padding-bottom="0pt" padding-right="5.4pt"
border-top-style="solid" border-bottom-style="solid" border-top-color="black"
border-bottom-color="black" border-top-width="0.25pt"
border-bottom-width="0.25pt" border-left-style="solid"
border-right-style="solid" border-left-color="black" border-right-color="black"
border-left-width="0.25pt" border-right-width="0.25pt" display-align="center">
            <fo:block font-family="Arial" font-size="7pt" language="DE"
line-height="9pt" text-align="center">
                <fo:inline font-size="7pt">
                    <fo:leader leader-length="0pt"/>322
                </fo:inline>
            </fo:block> 
        </fo:table-cell>
        <fo:table-cell border-collapse="collapse" padding-top="0pt"
padding-left="5.4pt" padding-bottom="0pt" padding-right="5.4pt"
border-top-style="solid" border-bottom-style="solid" border-top-color="black"
border-bottom-color="black" border-top-width="0.25pt"
border-bottom-width="0.25pt" border-left-style="solid"
border-right-style="solid" border-left-color="black" border-right-color="black"
border-left-width="0.25pt" border-right-width="0.5pt" display-align="center">
            <fo:block font-family="Arial" font-size="8pt" language="DE"
text-align="center" font-weight="bold">
                <fo:inline font-family="Arial" font-weight="bold"
font-size="8pt" language="DE">
                    <xsl:value-of
select="elements/element[@name='field322']/value"/> 
                </fo:inline>
            </fo:block> 
        </fo:table-cell>
    </fo:table-row>
    <fo:table-row border-collapse="collapse">
        <fo:table-cell border-collapse="collapse" padding-top="0pt"
padding-left="5.4pt" padding-bottom="0pt" padding-right="5.4pt"
border-top-style="none" border-bottom-style="none" border-top-color="black"
border-bottom-color="black" border-top-width="0.25pt"
border-bottom-width="0.25pt" border-left-style="solid" border-right-style="none"
border-left-color="black" border-right-color="black" border-left-width="0.5pt"
border-right-width="0.25pt" number-rows-spanned="3">
            <fo:block font-family="Arial" font-size="8pt" language="DE"
space-before="4pt" space-before.conditionality="retain" font-weight="bold">
                <fo:inline font-size="8pt">
                    <fo:leader leader-length="0pt"/>*)
                </fo:inline>
            </fo:block> 
        </fo:table-cell>
        <fo:table-cell border-collapse="collapse" padding-top="0pt"
padding-left="5.4pt" padding-bottom="0pt" padding-right="5.4pt"
border-top-style="none" border-bottom-style="none" border-top-color="black"
border-bottom-color="black" border-top-width="0.25pt"
border-bottom-width="0.25pt" border-left-style="none" border-right-style="none"
border-left-color="black" border-right-color="black" border-left-width="0.25pt"
border-right-width="0.25pt" number-rows-spanned="3">
            <fo:block font-family="Arial" font-size="8pt" language="DE"
space-before="4pt" space-before.conditionality="retain">
                <fo:inline font-family="Arial" font-weight="bold"
font-size="8pt" language="DE">
                    <fo:leader leader-length="0pt"/>Zeile 321- 324, 327 u. 328:
Bei mehreren Kreisen
                </fo:inline>
                <fo:inline font-family="Arial" font-size="8pt" language="DE">
                    <fo:leader leader-length="0pt"/>/ Gruppen: Summe der
                </fo:inline>
                <fo:inline font-family="Arial" font-size="8pt" language="DE">
                    <fo:leader leader-length="0pt"/>durchchnittl
                </fo:inline>
                <fo:inline font-family="Arial" font-size="8pt" language="DE">
                    <fo:leader leader-length="0pt"/>. Zahl der Teilnehmer/ innen
angeben.
                </fo:inline>
            </fo:block> 
        </fo:table-cell>
        <fo:table-cell border-collapse="collapse" padding-top="0pt"
padding-left="5.4pt" padding-bottom="0pt" padding-right="5.4pt"
border-top-style="solid" border-bottom-style="none" border-top-color="black"
border-bottom-color="black" border-top-width="0.25pt"
border-bottom-width="0.25pt" border-left-style="none" border-right-style="none"
border-left-color="black" border-right-color="black" border-left-width="0.25pt"
border-right-width="0.25pt" number-rows-spanned="2">
            <fo:block font-family="Arial" font-size="8pt" language="DE"
space-before="4pt" space-before.conditionality="retain" font-weight="bold">
                <fo:inline font-family="Arial" font-weight="bold"
font-size="8pt" language="DE">
                    <fo:leader leader-length="0pt"/>Jugendgruppen in der
                </fo:inline>
            </fo:block>
            <fo:block font-family="Arial" font-size="8pt" language="DE"
font-weight="bold">
                <fo:inline font-family="Arial" font-weight="bold"
font-size="8pt" language="DE">
                    <fo:leader leader-length="0pt"/>Gemeinde (einschließlich
Christenlehre) *)
                </fo:inline>
            </fo:block> 
        </fo:table-cell>
        <fo:table-cell border-collapse="collapse" padding-top="0pt"
padding-left="5.4pt" padding-bottom="0pt" padding-right="5.4pt"
border-top-style="solid" border-bottom-style="solid" border-top-color="black"
border-bottom-color="black" border-top-width="0.25pt"

border-left-color="black" border-right-color="black" border-left-width="0.25pt"
border-right-width="0.25pt" display-align="center">
            <fo:block font-family="Arial" font-size="8pt" language="DE"
line-height="9pt" space-before="2pt" space-before.conditionality="retain"
text-align="right">
                <fo:inline>
                    <fo:leader leader-length="0pt"/>Anzahl der Kreise
                </fo:inline>
            </fo:block>

        <fo:table-cell border-collapse="collapse" padding-top="0pt"
padding-left="5.4pt" padding-bottom="0pt" padding-right="5.4pt"

select="elements/element[@name='field327']/value"/>

    <fo:table-row border-collapse="collapse">

line-height="9pt" text-align="center">
                <fo:inline font-size="7pt">
                    <fo:leader leader-length="0pt"/>328
                </fo:inline>
            </fo:block> 
        </fo:table-cell>
        <fo:table-cell border-collapse="collapse" padding-top="0pt"
padding-left="5.4pt" padding-bottom="0pt" padding-right="5.4pt"

font-size="8pt" language="DE">

select="elements/element[@name='field328']/value"/>

            </fo:block>

    <fo:table-row border-collapse="collapse">
        <fo:table-cell border-collapse="collapse" padding-top="0pt"
padding-left="5.4pt" padding-bottom="0pt" padding-right="5.4pt"
border-top-style="solid" border-bottom-style="solid" border-top-color="black"
border-bottom-color="black" border-top-width="0.25pt"
border-bottom-width="0.25pt" border-left-style="none" border-right-style="none"
border-left-color="black" border-right-color="black" border-left-width="0.25pt"
border-right-width="0.25pt" number-rows-spanned="2">
            <fo:block font-family="Arial" font-size="8pt" language="EN-US"
space-before="4pt" space-before.conditionality="retain" font-weight="bold">
                <fo:inline font-family="Arial" font-weight="bold" font-size="8pt">
                    <fo:leader leader-length="0pt"/>Eltern-Kind-Gruppen
                </fo:inline>
                <fo:inline font-family="Arial" font-weight="bold" font-size="8pt">
                    <fo:block/>

                    <fo:leader leader-length="0pt"/>Spielkreise
                </fo:inline>
                <fo:inline font-family="Arial" font-weight="bold" font-size="8pt">
                    <fo:leader leader-length="0pt"/>) *)

                </fo:inline>
            </fo:block> 
        </fo:table-cell>
        <fo:table-cell border-collapse="collapse" padding-top="0pt"
padding-left="5.4pt" padding-bottom="0pt" padding-right="5.4pt"
border-top-style="none" border-bottom-style="solid" border-top-color="black"
border-bottom-color="black" border-top-width="0.25pt"
border-bottom-width="0.25pt" border-left-style="none" border-right-style="none"
border-left-color="black" border-right-color="black" border-left-width="0.25pt"
border-right-width="0.25pt" number-rows-spanned="3">
            <fo:block font-family="Arial" font-size="8pt" language="DE"
space-before="4pt" space-before.conditionality="retain" font-weight="bold">
                <fo:inline font-family="Arial" font-weight="bold"
font-size="8pt" language="DE">
                    <fo:leader leader-length="0pt"/>Zeile 325 und 326:
                </fo:inline>
            </fo:block>
            <fo:block font-family="Arial" font-size="8pt" language="DE"
font-weight="bold">
                <fo:inline font-family="Arial" font-weight="bold"
font-size="8pt" language="DE">
                    <fo:leader leader-length="0pt"/>Mehrtägige
                </fo:inline>
            </fo:block>
            <fo:block font-family="Arial" font-size="8pt" language="DE">
                <fo:inline font-family="Arial" font-size="8pt" language="DE">
                    <fo:leader leader-length="0pt"/>Veranstaltungen  werden
                </fo:inline>
            </fo:block>
            <fo:block font-family="Arial" font-size="8pt" language="DE">
                <fo:inline font-family="Arial" font-size="8pt" language="DE">
                    <fo:leader leader-length="0pt"/>als eine Veranstaltung
                </fo:inline>
            </fo:block>
            <fo:block font-family="Arial" font-size="8pt" language="DE">
                <fo:inline font-family="Arial" font-size="8pt" language="DE">
                    <fo:leader leader-length="0pt"/>gezählt.
                </fo:inline>
            </fo:block> 
        </fo:table-cell>

padding-left="5.4pt" padding-bottom="0pt" padding-right="5.4pt"
border-top-style="solid" border-bottom-style="solid" border-top-color="black"
border-bottom-color="black" border-top-width="0.25pt"

border-left-color="black" border-right-color="black" border-left-width="0.25pt"
border-right-width="0.25pt">

line-height="9pt" space-before="2pt" space-before.conditionality="retain"
text-align="right">

creator: jeremias@apache.org
text:
Bug fixed in SVN Trunk:
http://svn.apache.org/viewcvs?rev=372504&view=rev

A hint for your stylesheet:
Please realize that the border-collapse only has an effect on fo:table. You can
omit them on all child elements. Furthermore, border-collapse="collapse" is
currently not supported. Please use border-collapse="separate".

creator: gadams@apache.org
text: batch transition pre-FOP1.0 resolved+fixed bugs to closed+fixed
